name: Greeting Card Widget Playground
description:
Celebrate milestones big and small with the greeting card widget for FigJam. Pick from 6 card templates in up to 5 color variations, add a personalized message, and then invite others to add their own notes and images.


This playground is designed to help you get started with the widget.
